home_page_title: Scalable MRV Solutions for Agroforestry and Rice-Based Carbon Projects
home_page_subtitle: A unified platform that automates carbon monitoring and credit calculations for agroforestry and rice farming, with minimal ground intervention.
remote_sensing_description: Utilize open satellite APIs to continuously monitor farms at scale, tracking tree cover, biomass growth, and flooding cycles.
ai_analytics_description: Translate raw data into actionable carbon metrics, estimating biomass, carbon stock, and methane emissions.
farmer_friendly_app_description: A lightweight, offline-first application for farmers to register fields, log activities, and receive personalized feedback.
select_location_alert: Please select a location on the map.
farm_registered_alert: Farm registered successfully! (Check console for data)
